Uses of Class
org.securecryptoconfig.AbstractSCCCiphertext

  • Uses of AbstractSCCCiphertext in org.securecryptoconfig

    Subclasses of AbstractSCCCiphertext in org.securecryptoconfig 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  SCCCiphertext
    Container for the ciphertext (as result from encrypting a plaintext/plaintextcontainer).
    Methods in org.securecryptoconfig that return AbstractSCCCiphertext 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    AbstractSCCCiphertext PlaintextContainerInterface.encryptAsymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey pair)
    Asymmetric encryption with a certain SCCKey for PlaintextContainer value.
    AbstractSCCCiphertext SecureCryptoConfigInterface.encryptAsymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey keyPair, byte[] plaintext)
    Asymmetric encryption with a certain SCCKey for a given plaintext based on the current Secure Crypto Config file.
    AbstractSCCCiphertext SecureCryptoConfigInterface.encryptAsymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey keyPair, PlaintextContainerInterface plaintext)
    Asymmetric encryption with a certain SCCKey for a given plaintext based on the current Secure Crypto Config file.
    AbstractSCCCiphertext PlaintextContainerInterface.encryptSymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey key)
    Symmetric encryption with a certain SCCKey for PlaintextContainer value.
    AbstractSCCCiphertext SecureCryptoConfigInterface.encryptSymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey key, byte[] plaintext)
    Symmetric encryption with a certain SCCKey for a given plaintext based on the current Secure Crypto Config file.
    AbstractSCCCiphertext SecureCryptoConfigInterface.encryptSymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey key, PlaintextContainerInterface plaintext)
    Symmetric encryption with a certain SCCKey for a given plaintext based on the current Secure Crypto Config file.
    (package private) abstract AbstractSCCCiphertext AbstractSCCCiphertext.reEncryptAsymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey keyPair)
    Encrypts SCCCiphertext again, possibly using a different algorithm/parameters.
    AbstractSCCCiphertext SecureCryptoConfigInterface.reEncryptAsymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey keyPair, AbstractSCCCiphertext ciphertext)
    Ciphertext will be first decrypted and then encrypted based on the current Secure Crypto Config file.
    (package private) abstract AbstractSCCCiphertext AbstractSCCCiphertext.reEncryptSymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey key)
    Encrypts SCCCiphertext again, possibly using a different algorithm/parameters.
    AbstractSCCCiphertext SecureCryptoConfigInterface.reEncryptSymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey key, AbstractSCCCiphertext ciphertext)
    Ciphertext will be first decrypted and then encrypted again with the current used Secure Crypto Config file.
    Methods in org.securecryptoconfig with parameters of type AbstractSCCCiphertext 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    PlaintextContainer SecureCryptoConfig.decryptAsymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey keyPair, AbstractSCCCiphertext ciphertext)  
    PlaintextContainerInterface SecureCryptoConfigInterface.decryptAsymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey keyPair, AbstractSCCCiphertext ciphertext)
    Asymmetric decryption with a certain SCCKey for a given SCCCiphertext.
    PlaintextContainer SecureCryptoConfig.decryptSymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey key, AbstractSCCCiphertext sccciphertext)  
    PlaintextContainerInterface SecureCryptoConfigInterface.decryptSymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey key, AbstractSCCCiphertext sccciphertext)
    Decryption of a given SCCCiphertext.
    SCCCiphertext SecureCryptoConfig.reEncryptAsymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey keyPair, AbstractSCCCiphertext ciphertext)  
    AbstractSCCCiphertext SecureCryptoConfigInterface.reEncryptAsymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey keyPair, AbstractSCCCiphertext ciphertext)
    Ciphertext will be first decrypted and then encrypted based on the current Secure Crypto Config file.
    SCCCiphertext SecureCryptoConfig.reEncryptSymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey key, AbstractSCCCiphertext ciphertext)  
    AbstractSCCCiphertext SecureCryptoConfigInterface.reEncryptSymmetric​(AbstractSCCKey key, AbstractSCCCiphertext ciphertext)
    Ciphertext will be first decrypted and then encrypted again with the current used Secure Crypto Config file.
